name: HOUSEHOLD & COMMERCIAL PRODUCTS ASSOCIATION
description: Trade association for household and commercial cleaning product industry.
sampleDescriptions: Discuss importance of household and commercial cleaning products in COVID-19 pandemic response in residential and commercial settings; support measures to provide tax credits for purchase of cleaning
Discuss importance of household and commercial cleaning products in COVID-19 pandemic response in residential and commercial settings; support measures to provide tax credits for purchase of cleaning
Discuss importance of household and commercial cleaning products in COVID-19 pandemic response in residential and commercial settings; support measures to provide tax credits for purchase of cleaning
Support measures to provide tax credits for purchase of cleaning products, including in S. 4214 and H.R. 7615, the Healthy Workplaces Tax Credit Act.
Discuss importance of household and commercial cleaning products in COVID-19 pandemic response in residential and commercial settings.
